name: Escape The City (itch)
description:
i spend 24h for this game for the Ynov Game Jam , hoe you will enjoy it

You got a verry important mission , you have to give a paper to Mr president , but many people want you to never arrive to the white house.

Escape the city in 60 secondes

you can use w a s d to control your caracter and space to dash , or you can use the controller with X to dash
